linesOfText.text: Why did the child study in the airplane?
He wanted a higher education!
Why was the broom late?
It over swept!
What is full of holes but can still hold water?
A sponge!
What do computer operators eat for lunch?
Chips!
What do you get when you cross a cat with a parrot?
A carrot!
Why did the hen cross the road?
To prove she wasn't chicken!
What creatures stick to the bottom of sheep ships?
Baaa-nacles!
What kind of hair does the ocean have?
Wavy!
What happened when the cat ate a ball of wool?
She had mittens!
Why were the early days of history called the dark ages?
Because there were so many knights!
How did the Vikings send secret messages?
By norse code!
What runs but never walks?
Water!
Did you hear about the romance in the tropical fish tank?
It was a case of guppy love!
What is the best hand to write with?
Neither - it's best to write with a pen!
Where does success come before work?
In the dictionary!
How was the Roman Empire cut in half?
With a pair of Caesars!
What stories do the ship captain's children like to hear?
Ferry tales!
What's an insect's favorite sport?
Cricket!
How did Noah see the animals in the Ark at night?
By flood lighting!
What is the best thing to take into the desert?
A thirst aid kit!
Why did the lazy man want a job in a bakery?
So he could loaf around!
What pet makes the loudest noise?
A trum-pet!
Why did the king go to the dentist?
To get his teeth crowned!
What is the most slippery country in the world?
Greece!
What is the quickest way to double your money?
Fold it in half!
